sentences.sContent: The Party must strengthen its leadership over trade unions, the Communist Youth League, women’s federations and other mass organizations, and give full scope to their roles.
sentences.sCn: 党必须加强对工会、共产主义青年团、妇女联合会等群众组织的领导，充分发挥它们的作用。

sentences.sContent: The Youth League of the Conservative Party, for example, withdrew its “Better Dead Than Red” election flier.
sentences.sCn: 比如，保守党的青年团就撤掉了印着“宁死不屈”的广告传单。
